Parenthesize With Spacing.description: Enclose the current selection in parentheses, with spacing

Parenthesize Without Spacing.description: Enclose the current selection in parentheses, without spacing

Curly Bracketize With Spacing.description: Enclose the current selection in curly brackets, with spacing

Curly Bracketize Without Spacing.description: Enclose the current selection in curly brackets, without spacing

Square Bracketize Without Spacing.description: Enclose the current selection in square brackets, without spacing
